segments.text: Good evening , can I get you a drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I would like a Coke .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to order anything off the appetizer menu ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's see , can I get some fried zucchini , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to order anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , call me when you're ready to place the rest of your order .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to order my food now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did you want to order ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I get a cheeseburger and some fries ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I get you anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1
